a.title: Quote from - Hannah Javoroski, '17
a.span: More on Arrowhead offers so many academic and social opportunities. I am grateful to be part of such a unified student body of hard working individuals!

div.h4: "Arrowhead offers so many academic and social opportunities. I am grateful to be part of such a unified student body of hard working individuals!"

a.title: Quote from - Abby Cabush, '18
a.span: More on I love how Arrowhead sets such high standards for both its students and athletes. All of the honors and AP...

div.h4: "I love how Arrowhead sets such high standards for both its students and athletes. All of the honors and AP..."

a.title: Quote from - Peyton Westcott, '18
a.span: More on The diversified student body is exceptional with talent and the opportunities are endless everywhere through...

div.h4: "The diversified student body is exceptional with talent and the opportunities are endless everywhere through..."

a.title: Quote from - Michelle Parks, '17
a.span: More on The amazing thing about the Arrowhead community is this: We are endlessly...

div.h4: "The amazing thing about the Arrowhead community is this: We are endlessly..."

a.title: Quote from - Abigail Fahey, '18
a.span: More on Arrowhead is full of great teachers who love their jobs and want to help students learn.

div.h4: "Arrowhead is full of great teachers who love their jobs and want to help students learn."

a.title: Quote from Emme Audley, '18
a.span: More on Arrowhead is known to have something for everyone which carries through to each class. There is a variety of learning methods used by each teacher to help the visual learner, the kinesthetic learner, and the auditory learner.

div.h4: "Arrowhead is known to have something for everyone which carries through to each class. There is a variety of learning methods used by each teacher to help the visual learner, the kinesthetic learner, and the auditory learner."

a.title: Quote from - Coach Mike Mulrooney
a.span: More on Arrowhead provides great multi educational opportunities for students to excel academically, culturally, athletically and socially. Students are challenged beyond their comfort zones and discover greater self potential than they previously believed that they possessed.

div.h4: "Arrowhead provides great multi educational opportunities for students to excel academically, culturally, athletically and socially. Students are challenged beyond their comfort zones and discover greater self potential than they previously believed that they possessed."
